The weather is way too nice!!! Today we¡¦re going to have a BARBECUE at beach of Wai-mu-mountain for celebrating Chi-wei and Agi were leaving the army!!! Although it was happen two months ago. :P They prepared lots of things to eat, and invited several friends to the come. It's really a right day to come!!! The ocean is so blue and sun is shiny~ I love ocean!!! I love blue sky!!! I love Bikinni!!! (but no one wore it...) ~~sigh~~ Well, beach volleyball was so different from indoor volleyball, it's really hard to jump and hit the ball in the way you expected, besides, the blood of my right hand sonly getting black. :'( It feels like I have never played volleyball before! (...Maybe twice la) But I'll get used to it, anyhow, if I'm to play more often. In a hurry, I give up this thought cuz my hands are getting more and more hurt~ terrible~ They are Mimi and Dudu, **Mimi is female** **Dudu is male** They could be really good modle, right?? urlLink ~¬Ý­Ó¤º®e
